history.proof: intros u v H. unfold colineaire in *. qsimpl time: 1 use: double_permute. qsimpl time: 1 use: R_permute,double_permute. qsimpl time: 1 use: R_permute,rotation,double_permute. hecrush use: double_permute, permute, symetrique, transitive unfold: double.

exceptions.exn: In environment u, v : V H : R (double (cons u v)) zero Unable to unify "R (double (cons ?M1445 ?M1444)) (double (cons ?M1447 ?M1446))" with "R (double (cons v u)) zero".

In environment H0 : forall u v w t : V, R (double (cons u v)) (double (cons w t)) -> R (double (cons v u)) (double (cons t w)) u, v : V H : R (double (cons u v)) zero Unable to unify "R (cons ?M1663 ?M1662) (cons ?M1665 ?M1664)" with "R (double (cons v u)) zero".

In environment H2 : forall u v w t : V, R (double (cons u v)) (double (cons w t)) -> R (double (cons v u)) (double (cons t w)) H1 : forall u v w t : V, R (cons u v) (cons w t) -> R (cons v u) (cons t w) u, v : V H : R (double (cons u v)) zero Unable to unify "R (cons ?M1960 ?M1961) (cons ?M1962 ?M1963)" with "R (double (cons v u)) zero".

original: intros u v H. unfold colineaire in *. apply double_permute. apply R_permute. apply rotation. auto.
